scripts.build.react: tsc react/index.tsx --noEmitHelpers true --module commonjs --lib es2015,dom --jsx "react" --skipLibCheck true --experimentalDecorators true --declaration true
scripts.build.full: npm run build.react && npm run build && npm run build.angular
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.test.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link @enduco/ui-pager && cd ../demo-ng && npm link @enduco/ui-pager && cd ../src
scripts.debug.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns debug ios
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo.ng.ios.aot: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios  --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.demo.ng.android.aot: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android  --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android
scripts.demo.react.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-react && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.react.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-react && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && rimraf platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rimraf platforms && cd ../demo-vue && npm run clean
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @enduco/ui-pager && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove @enduco/ui-pager && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.ngc: npm i && npm run ngc.clean && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/.bin/ngc -noEmitOnError -skipLibCheck -p tsconfig.json
